00035 #ifndef HARPS_NOTE
00036 #define HARPS_NOTE
00037 
00038 namespace harps {
00042   class Note {
00043     public:
00044       enum NoteState {
00045         NOTE_ON = 1,
00046         NOTE_OFF = 2,
00047         NOTE_WAIT = 3
00048       };
00052       Note() : status( NOTE_WAIT ) {}
00056       virtual ~Note() {}
00061       void noteOn( float _touch = 1.0f ) {
00062         status = NOTE_ON;
00063         touch = _touch;
00064       }
00068       void noteOff() {
00069         status = NOTE_OFF;
00070       }
00074       void noteWait() {
00075         status = NOTE_WAIT;
00076       }
00081       NoteState getStatus() const {
00082         return status;
00083       }
00088       float getTouch() const {
00089         return touch;
00090       }
00091     private:
00092       NoteState status;
00093       float touch;
00094   };
00095 }
00096 
00097 #endif
